statements: SELECT * FROM art_marketplace WHERE artist_name = 'Picasso';
SELECT artwork_name, price FROM art_marketplace WHERE price > 500;
SELECT artist_name, inventory_count FROM art_marketplace ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM art_marketplace WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT artwork_id, artwork_name, artist_name, price FROM art_marketplace WHERE inventory_count > 0;
SELECT * FROM art_marketplace WHERE artist_name = 'Vincent Van Gogh';
SELECT artwork_name, price FROM art_marketplace WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT artist_name, SUM(price) AS total_revenue FROM art_marketplace GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT * FROM art_marketplace WHERE inventory_count <= 10 ORDER BY artwork_name;
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name, inventory_count FROM art_marketplace WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Pablo%'
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT art_name, artist_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount >= 500 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT art_name, artist_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sale_id, art_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT art_id, artist_name FROM inventory WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY artist_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT art_id, art_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT s.sale_id, s.sale_date, i.art_name, i.price FROM sales s INNER JOIN inventory i ON s.art_id = i.art_id WHERE s.sale_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY s.sale_date ASC, i.price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT artwork_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE artist_name = 'Van Gogh';
SELECT buyer_name, payment_amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT artwork_name, price FROM inventory WHERE in_stock > 0 AND price < 1000;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, artwork_name, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount >= 500 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name, in_stock FROM inventory WHERE in_stock > 0 ORDER BY artwork_name
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT buyer_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM transaction_history GROUP BY buyer_name HAVING total_payments > 5000 ORDER BY total_payments DESC
SELECT s.artwork_name, s.artist_name, t.buyer_name, t.transaction_date FROM sales s INNER JOIN transaction_history t ON s.sale_id = t.sale_id WHERE t.transaction_date >= '2021-08-01'
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT artwork_id, artist_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT transaction_id, sale_id, total_amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT sales_id, buyer_id, seller_id FROM Sales;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT u.username, s.sale_date, i.artwork_name FROM Users u JOIN Sales s ON u.user_id = s.buyer_id JOIN Inventory i ON s.artwork_id = i.artwork_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.total_amount, s.sale_date FROM Transactions t JOIN Sales s ON t.sale_id = s.sales_id ORDER BY t.total_amount DESC;

SELECT u.username, t.transaction_date, i.artwork_name FROM Users u JOIN Transactions t ON u.user_id = t.sale_id JOIN Inventory i ON t.sale_id = i.artwork_id WHERE t.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT artwork_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date, country FROM artists WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT art.artwork_name, inv.quantity, inv.location FROM artworks AS art INNER JOIN inventory AS inv ON art.artwork_id = inv.artwork_id WHERE art.price < 5000;
SELECT trans.transaction_id, sales.sale_amount, trans.transaction_date FROM transactions AS trans INNER JOIN sales ON trans.sales_id = sales.sales_id ORDER BY trans.transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_amount DESC, sale_date ASC;
SELECT artwork_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date, country FROM artists WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT inventory_id, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, sales_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
